comments.text: I ran into this today when trying to work with a page with a giant dropdown. I clicked to stop the chrome js, but after waiting a while for it anyways, the firefox window was now hosed. I could not close or interact with the window at all. Hotkeys did not work either. Seems like firefox should either not offer the prompt or not hose itself when the chrome js is stopped.
